Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2011 10:44AM momjboss wrote: My breast actually hurts at the excisional site and deep within the breast.  I do have quite a scar, so it could be scar tissue.  Guess we'll see in April.  Thanks for the help.
Posts.Title: ADH and shape of breast momjboss worriedwoman

Posts.Content: momjboss wrote: I had an excisional biopsy 4 months ago that came back ADH.  Up until about a month ago, where they removed the ducts, it was flat.  My breast looked a little square.  Since then it has filled in, meaning it is round again, but it hurts.  I do not go back for a mammo and exam for 2 more months. Has anyone else that had a biopsy experienced this?  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: ADH and shape of breast momjboss worriedwoman
